.. zingg.zingg module

Module contents
---------------

Zingg Python APIs for entity resolution, record linkage, data mastering and deduplication
(https://www.zingg.ai) 

requires python 3.6+; spark 3.1.2
Otherwise, :py:func:`zingg.Zingg` cannot be executed

.. automodule:: zingg.zingg
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
